content: X-MW ALH L Wire hanger system Wire hanger system for spiral HVAC ducting and lighting applications, installed using powder-actuated fastening tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Wire suspension system- - - ### FEATURES:Features Shorter installation time – wire rope suspensions are a faster alternative to threaded rod Easier to adjust – self-closing wire lock can be adjusted tool-free, making leveling, retrofitting and long drop lengths much simpler Aesthetics – wire rope suspension is a discreet installation method for exposed building services and open soffits Can be fastened while standing on the floor using the DX pole tool – safer method of installation avoiding lifts and ladders All you need in one sales box (lock, pre-cut wires and nail clip) Applications Suspending spiral HVAC duct from concrete Suspending electrical lighting from the ceiling Suspending security attachments (secondary attachment point to work if first attachment point fails) Up to 100 lbs allowable load values Suitable for use in dry, indoor environments only For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: HVAC connections Material: Carbon steel For use with (tools): DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 Technical Data | Application | HVAC connections | Material | Carbon steel | For use with (tools) | DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 | Base materials | Concrete (tough), Concrete (soft), Concrete (pre-cast), Concrete (normal-weight over metal deck), Steel | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2325732 - Wire hanger system X-MW ALH27 L 20ft/6m - Package Size 20 pc - 2325730 - Wire hanger system X-MW ALH27 L 6ft/2m - Package Size 30 pc - 2325731 - Wire hanger system X-MW ALH27 L 10ft/3m - Package Size 30 pc - 2325733 - Wire hanger system X-MW ALH32 L 10ft/3m - Package Size 30 pc - 3762217 - X-MW ALH27 L 20ft/6m w/ DX351-ME - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DX351 Basic unit - 1x X-P8S-351 Piston - 1x X-FG8ME351 Fastener guide - 1x COUPLING NUT (REPAIR PART) - 2x SPRING 0.5X5.3X19 (REPAIR PART) - 4x SCREW DELTA-PT 35 X 11 - 1x DX 351 Cleaning Kit - 1x DX 351 Tool case - 200x Cartridge 6.8/11 M10 .27 cal C-T red - 200x Wire hanger system X-MW ALH27 L 20ft/6m - 1x Modular pole tool X-PT 351 - 3762216 - X-MW ALH27 L 10ft/3m w/ DX351-ME - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DX351 Basic unit - 1x X-P8S-351 Piston - 1x X-FG8ME351 Fastener guide - 1x COUPLING NUT (REPAIR PART) - 2x SPRING 0.5X5.3X19 (REPAIR PART) - 4x SCREW DELTA-PT 35 X 11 - 1x DX 351 Cleaning Kit - 1x DX 351 Tool case - 300x Cartridge 6.8/11 M10 .27 cal C-T red - 300x Wire hanger system X-MW ALH27 L 10ft/3m - 1x Modular pole tool X-PT 351
